work.name: Hopsworks AI

work.name: SoyMomo
work.summary: Developed AI products for family safety, including a child-friendly assistant and baby cry detection models.
highlights: Achieved 92% accuracy in baby cry detection for various needs (e.g., hunger, discomfort)
Deployed ML models on Azure ML and implemented real-time performance monitoring

work.name: National Center for Artificial Intelligence

highlights: Fine-tuned Stable Diffusion for museum exhibit applications
